Health Check Service

NOTICE:

The namespace prefix http://cisco.com/jnap/ has been deprecated but is still supported. All JNAP clients should switch to the new namespace prefix http://linksys.com/jnap/.

Change History

Revision Date Notes
1.0.2 2023-06-28 Added SpeedTestSamKnows to enum SupportedHealthCheckModule
1.0.1 2017-06-27 Moved HealthCheckManager service out of Nodes' namespace
1.0.0 2016-05-04 Initial release

Services

HealthCheckManager

http://linksys.com/jnap/healthcheck/HealthCheckManager
This service provides access to perform and retrieve health checks.

Service Actions

  • ClearHealthCheckHistory
  • GetHealthCheckResults
  • GetHealthCheckStatus
  • GetSupportedHealthCheckModules
  • RunHealthCheck
  • StopHealthCheck

Actions

ClearHealthCheckHistory

http://linksys.com/jnap/healthcheck/ClearHealthCheckHistory
This action clears the health check database.

Input Parameters

This action does not have any input parameters.

Output Parameters

This action does not have any output parameters.

Result

http://linksys.com/jnap/healthcheck/ClearHealthCheckHistoryResult
Value Description
OK Success.
Error
_ErrorAbortedAction
_ErrorDisallowedAction
_ErrorInvalidInput
_ErrorInvalidOutput
_ErrorNotReady
_ErrorSessionVerification
_ErrorUnauthorized
_ErrorUnexpected
_ErrorUnknownAction
_ErrorUnknownSession

Sample Transaction

POST [request-uri] HTTP/1.1
Host: 192.168.1.1
Content-Type: application/json; charset=utf-8
Content-Length: [number of octets in request body]
X-JNAP-Action: "http://linksys.com/jnap/healthcheck/ClearHealthCheckHistory"

{
}
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Content-Type: application/json; charset=utf-8
Content-Length: [number of octets in response body]

{
  "result": "OK"
}

GetHealthCheckResults

http://linksys.com/jnap/healthcheck/GetHealthCheckResults
This action gets the status of the previously run health checks.

Note:

This action is safe to call within the context of a transaction.

Input Parameters

Name Type Optional Description
includeModuleResults bool no The flag to include the result from each health check Modules.
healthCheckModule SupportedHealthCheckModule yes If specified, only this module's single run results are returned.
resultIDs long[] yes If specified, only the following resultIDs are returned.
lastNumberOfResults long yes The desired number of the most recent result. If none specified, all historical health check results are returned.

Output Parameters

Name Type Optional Description
healthCheckResults HealthCheckResult[] no The list of health check results requested. If no data matches the specified parameter, this will return an empty array.

Result

http://linksys.com/jnap/healthcheck/GetHealthCheckResultsResult
Value Description
OK Success.
Error
ErrorUnsupportedHealthCheckModule Health check module specified is not valid.
_ErrorAbortedAction
_ErrorInvalidInput
_ErrorInvalidOutput
_ErrorNotReady
_ErrorSessionVerification
_ErrorUnauthorized
_ErrorUnexpected
_ErrorUnknownAction
_ErrorUnknownSession

Sample Transaction

POST [request-uri] HTTP/1.1
Host: 192.168.1.1
Content-Type: application/json; charset=utf-8
Content-Length: [number of octets in request body]
X-JNAP-Action: "http://linksys.com/jnap/healthcheck/GetHealthCheckResults"

{
  "includeModuleResults": false,
  "healthCheckModule": "SpeedTest",
  "resultIDs": [
    9223372036854775807
  ],
  "lastNumberOfResults": 10
}
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Content-Type: application/json; charset=utf-8
Content-Length: [number of octets in response body]

{
  "result": "OK",
  "output": {
    "healthCheckResults": [
      {
        "resultID": 9223372036854775807,
        "timestamp": "2016-07-23T14:30:59Z",
        "healthCheckModulesRequested": [
          "SpeedTest"
        ],
        "speedTestResult": {
          "resultID": 2,
          "exitCode": "Success",
          "serverID": "1423",
          "latency": 15,
          "uploadBandwidth": 11088,
          "downloadBandwidth": 53736
        },
        "channelAnalyzerResult": {
        },
        "deviceScannerResult": {
        }
      }
    ]
  }
}

GetHealthCheckStatus

http://linksys.com/jnap/healthcheck/GetHealthCheckStatus
This action gets the status of the health check. It tells whether there is a health check module being performed along with its status.

Note:

This action is safe to call within the context of a transaction.

Input Parameters

This action does not have any input parameters.

Output Parameters

Name Type Optional Description
healthCheckModuleCurrentlyRunning SupportedHealthCheckModule yes Whether a health check is currently running. This value exists if and only if a health check is currently running. Otherwise, nothing is returned.
speedTestResult SpeedTestResult yes This value exists if and only if healthCheckModuleCurrentlyRunning is 'SpeedTest'.
channelAnalyzerResult ChannelAnalyzerResult yes This value exists if and only if healthCheckModuleCurrentlyRunning is 'ChannelAnalyzer'.
deviceScannerResult DeviceScannerResult yes This value exists if and only if healthCheckModuleCurrentlyRunning is 'DeviceScanner'.

Result

http://linksys.com/jnap/healthcheck/GetHealthCheckStatusResult
Value Description
OK Success.
Error
_ErrorAbortedAction
_ErrorInvalidInput
_ErrorInvalidOutput
_ErrorNotReady
_ErrorSessionVerification
_ErrorUnauthorized
_ErrorUnexpected
_ErrorUnknownAction
_ErrorUnknownSession

Sample Transaction

POST [request-uri] HTTP/1.1
Host: 192.168.1.1
Content-Type: application/json; charset=utf-8
Content-Length: [number of octets in request body]
X-JNAP-Action: "http://linksys.com/jnap/healthcheck/GetHealthCheckStatus"

{
}
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Content-Type: application/json; charset=utf-8
Content-Length: [number of octets in response body]

{
  "result": "OK",
  "output": {
    "healthCheckModuleCurrentlyRunning": "SpeedTest",
    "speedTestResult": {
      "resultID": 2,
      "exitCode": "Success",
      "serverID": "1423",
      "latency": 15,
      "uploadBandwidth": 11088,
      "downloadBandwidth": 53736
    },
    "channelAnalyzerResult": {
    },
    "deviceScannerResult": {
    }
  }
}

GetSupportedHealthCheckModules

http://linksys.com/jnap/healthcheck/GetSupportedHealthCheckModules
This action gets the status of the speed test.

Note:

This action is safe to call within the context of a transaction.

Input Parameters

This action does not have any input parameters.

Output Parameters

Name Type Optional Description
supportedHealthCheckModules SupportedHealthCheckModule[] no The list of supported health checks that can be run.

Result

http://linksys.com/jnap/healthcheck/GetSupportedHealthCheckModulesResult
Value Description
OK Success.
Error
_ErrorAbortedAction
_ErrorInvalidInput
_ErrorInvalidOutput
_ErrorNotReady
_ErrorSessionVerification
_ErrorUnauthorized
_ErrorUnexpected
_ErrorUnknownAction
_ErrorUnknownSession

Sample Transaction

POST [request-uri] HTTP/1.1
Host: 192.168.1.1
Content-Type: application/json; charset=utf-8
Content-Length: [number of octets in request body]
X-JNAP-Action: "http://linksys.com/jnap/healthcheck/GetSupportedHealthCheckModules"

{
}
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Content-Type: application/json; charset=utf-8
Content-Length: [number of octets in response body]

{
  "result": "OK",
  "output": {
    "supportedHealthCheckModules": [
      "SpeedTest"
    ]
  }
}

RunHealthCheck

http://linksys.com/jnap/healthcheck/RunHealthCheck
This action starts a suite of health checks. There can be only one health check run at any given time.

Input Parameters

Name Type Optional Description
runHealthCheckModule SupportedHealthCheckModule yes The health check module history to be run. If none specified, It will run all supported health check module. If specified, only that specific helath check module will be run.

Output Parameters

Name Type Optional Description
resultID long no The identifier that can be used to retrieve the result of each health checks

Result

http://linksys.com/jnap/healthcheck/RunHealthCheckResult
Value Description
OK Success.
Error
ErrorHealthCheckAlreadyRunning Unable to run health check. A health check is already running.
ErrorUnsupportedHealthCheckModule Health check module specified is not valid.
_ErrorAbortedAction
_ErrorDisallowedAction
_ErrorInvalidInput
_ErrorInvalidOutput
_ErrorNotReady
_ErrorSessionVerification
_ErrorUnauthorized
_ErrorUnexpected
_ErrorUnknownAction
_ErrorUnknownSession

Sample Transaction

POST [request-uri] HTTP/1.1
Host: 192.168.1.1
Content-Type: application/json; charset=utf-8
Content-Length: [number of octets in request body]
X-JNAP-Action: "http://linksys.com/jnap/healthcheck/RunHealthCheck"

{
  "runHealthCheckModule": "SpeedTest"
}
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Content-Type: application/json; charset=utf-8
Content-Length: [number of octets in response body]

{
  "result": "OK",
  "output": {
    "resultID": 9223372036854775807
  }
}

StopHealthCheck

http://linksys.com/jnap/healthcheck/StopHealthCheck
This action stops the currently running health checks, if any. Otherwise, it's a no-op.

Input Parameters

This action does not have any input parameters.

Output Parameters

This action does not have any output parameters.

Result

http://linksys.com/jnap/healthcheck/StopHealthCheckResult
Value Description
OK Success.
Error
_ErrorAbortedAction
_ErrorDisallowedAction
_ErrorInvalidInput
_ErrorInvalidOutput
_ErrorNotReady
_ErrorSessionVerification
_ErrorUnauthorized
_ErrorUnexpected
_ErrorUnknownAction
_ErrorUnknownSession

Sample Transaction

POST [request-uri] HTTP/1.1
Host: 192.168.1.1
Content-Type: application/json; charset=utf-8
Content-Length: [number of octets in request body]
X-JNAP-Action: "http://linksys.com/jnap/healthcheck/StopHealthCheck"

{
}
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Content-Type: application/json; charset=utf-8
Content-Length: [number of octets in response body]

{
  "result": "OK"
}

Structures

ChannelAnalyzerResult

http://linksys.com/jnap/healthcheck/ChannelAnalyzerResult
A channel analyzer module result.

Structure Members

Member Name Type Optional Description

DeviceScannerResult

http://linksys.com/jnap/healthcheck/DeviceScannerResult
A device scanner module result.

Structure Members

Member Name Type Optional Description

HealthCheckResult

http://linksys.com/jnap/healthcheck/HealthCheckResult
Health check result. Optional values will be returned if they exists in the database.

Structure Members

Member Name Type Optional Description
resultID long no The result identifier of the health check result.
timestamp DateTime no The time when the health check was requested.
healthCheckModulesRequested SupportedHealthCheckModule[] no The health check modules requested.
speedTestResult SpeedTestResult yes The speed test result. This exist if and only if healthCheckModulesRequestedcontains 'SpeedTest' and GetHealthCheckResults' includeModuleResult is true.
channelAnalyzerResult ChannelAnalyzerResult yes The speed test result. This exist if and only if healthCheckModulesRequestedcontains 'ChannelAnalyzer' and GetHealthCheckResults' includeModuleResult is true.
deviceScannerResult DeviceScannerResult yes The speed test result. This exist if and only if healthCheckModulesRequestedcontains 'DeviceScanner' and GetHealthCheckResults' includeModuleResult is true.

SpeedTestResult

http://linksys.com/jnap/healthcheck/SpeedTestResult
A speed test module result.

Structure Members

Member Name Type Optional Description
resultID long no The result ID.
exitCode HealthCheckModuleExitCode no The result of the speed test.
serverID string yes The server ID. The location can be retrieved from http://www.speedtest.net/speedtest-servers.php. This value exists as soon as it's available.
latency long yes The latency value in milliseconds. This value exists as soon as it's available.
uploadBandwidth long yes The upload bandwidth in kilobits per second. This value exists as soon as it's available.
downloadBandwidth long yes The download bandwidth in kilobits per second. This value exists as soon as it's available.

Enumerations

HealthCheckModuleExitCode

http://linksys.com/jnap/healthcheck/HealthCheckModuleExitCode
Possible values for health check exit code.

Enumeration Values

Value Description
Success Health check was successfully completed.
SpeedTestConfigurationError There is an error in the speed test configuration.
SpeedTestLicenseError Speed test license is likely to have expired.
SpeedTestExecutionError Error encountered during a speed test execution.
AbortedByUser A health check was aborted by user.
Unavailable Health check hasn't exited.
DBError DB Error of HealthCheck module

SupportedHealthCheckModule

http://linksys.com/jnap/healthcheck/SupportedHealthCheckModule
This service provides access to router's health check. There's a concept of single-module run and a health-check run. A single-module run allows users to perform only the desired test. A health-check run allows users to run a suite of supported health checks. Supported health check modules

Enumeration Values

Value Description
SpeedTest The speed test health check module.
SpeedTestSamKnows The SamKnows variation of the SpeedTest module.
ChannelAnalyzer The channel analyzer health check module.
DeviceScanner The device scanner health check module.
